Rough topaz
Type: Material
Value: 42
Fine Value: 202
Keywords: Gem
Rough gem
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A rough gem with a slight golden hue, waiting to be cut into something dazzling.

The Rough topaz item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Rough topaz is an ingredient in the following recipe:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Shape a topaz Needs Basic Trinketry Bench service or better. Trinketry lvl. 21 1x Rough topaz 1x Topaz

Job Boards

Rough topaz can be requested from the following jobs:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Rewards
Blackspell Port job board Blackspell Port 1 +1  Erdwise Faction Reputation
1x   Trinketry chest
Everhaven combined job board Everhaven 1 +1  Erdwise Faction Reputation
1x   Trinketry chest

Sources

Activity Drops

Activity Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡
Antique market assessor Trinketry lvl. 40 1 2.830% ~1 in 35 21,201 steps 11,166 steps
Mine ectoplasm rocks Mining lvl. 55 1 0.286% ~1 in 350 46,154 steps 20,979 steps

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
